text: فَإِنۡ حَآجُّوكَ فَقُلۡ أَسۡلَمۡتُ وَجۡهِيَ لِلَّهِ وَمَنِ ٱتَّبَعَنِۗ وَقُل لِّلَّذِينَ أُوتُواْ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ وَٱلۡأُمِّيِّـۧنَ ءَأَسۡلَمۡتُمۡۚ فَإِنۡ أَسۡلَمُواْ فَقَدِ ٱهۡتَدَواْۖ وَّإِن تَوَلَّوۡاْ فَإِنَّمَا عَلَيۡكَ ٱلۡبَلَٰغُۗ وَٱللَّهُ بَصِيرُۢ بِٱلۡعِبَادِ

translation.en: So if they argue with you, say, "I have submitted myself to Allah [in Islam], and [so have] those who follow me." And say to those who were given the Scripture and [to] the unlearned, "Have you submitted yourselves?" And if they submit [in Islam], they are rightly guided; but if they turn away - then upon you is only the [duty of] notification. And Allah is Seeing of [His] servants
translation.id: Kemudian jika mereka membantah engkau (Muhammad) katakanlah, "Aku berserah diri kepada Allah dan (demikian pula) orang-orang yang mengikutiku." Dan katakanlah kepada orang-orang yang telah diberi Kitab dan kepada orang-orang buta huruf,116) "Sudahkah kamu masuk Islam?" Jika mereka masuk Islam, berarti mereka telah mendapat petunjuk, tetapi jika mereka berpaling, maka kewajibanmu hanyalah menyampaikan. Dan Allah Maha Melihat hamba-hamba-Nya
